## TsConfigJson.CompilerOptions.maxNodeModuleJsDepth property

The maximum dependency depth to search under `node_modules` and load JavaScript files. Only applicable with `--allowJs`<!-- -->.

 0

**Signature:**

```typescript
maxNodeModuleJsDepth?: number;
```
